channel.title: How do i do so peeps gets mod instant when they log in

item.title: How do i do so peeps gets mod instant when they log in
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Under the initialize() method, add:
playerRights = 1;

item.title: How do i do so peeps gets mod instant when they log in
item.dc:creator: @Mitko Mitko
item.description:
@Mitko wrote:

Easy, go to Player.java
look for stuff similar to this

// Setting player standard look playerLook[0] = 2; playerLook[1] = 6; playerLook[2] = 7; playerLook[3] = 10; playerLook[4] = 5; playerLook[5] = 0;
Add

playerRights = 1;Under them.
So that means every new character created gets mod rights.
Tested it and it works 100% (On delta)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i do so peeps gets mod instant when they log in

item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

you can also go into characters, look for there name, open it up and where it says

player rights

give them from 1-3

1 - mod
2 - admin
3 - owner
